responses: Hello! Welcome to Leo Club. How can I help you today?
Hi there! I'm here to help with Leo Club information.
Leo Club is a youth organization where LEO stands for Leadership, Experience, and Opportunity.
We're part of Lions Club International, focusing on youth leadership and community service.
To join, be aged 12-30 and interested in service. Visit our 'Join Us' page.
Membership is open to youth committed to leadership development.
Use the main menu: Contact in 'Contact Us', events in 'Events' section.
Website sections include Home, About, Events, Members, Gallery.
I can only assist with Leo Club information and website navigation. Please ask about our activities or membership.
